data.title: A Woman's Revenge (2012 film)
data.meta_description: A Woman's Revenge is a 2012 Portuguese film directed by Rita Azevedo Gomes.
data.text:
A Woman's Revenge (Portuguese: A Vingança de uma Mulher) is a 2012 Portuguese film directed by Rita Azevedo Gomes.[1][2][3][4][5]

Quick Facts A Woman's Revenge, Portuguese ...

by Jules Amédée Barbey d'AurevillyStarringRita Durão
